April 12, 1987 D SCABA Spring Contest (Second Section)
SCABA Spring Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SCABA Spring Contest scaba-spring-contest-second-section
Dome Theatre, Brighton
Prizes 1st £200, 2nd £120, 3rd £80.
Best march - Horsham Borough.
6 bands competed.
